Articles.Content:
So this thread is about what you know about certain countries. Only officially recognised countries and Taiwan.

Example:

A:

What do you know about Germany?

B:

I know there is beer. Lots of beer.

What do you know about South Africa?

I will start off:

What do you know about Holland?

I live there so I know it's 'Koningsdag' today. (Kingsday is the birthday of our king Willem Alexander.)

![koningsdag-amsterdam-2014.jpg](http://www.oranjewinkel.nl/uploads/koningsdag-amsterdam-2014.jpg)

(Amsterdam, Koningsdag 2014)

Lets go south across the border. What do you know about Belgium?

I know waffles.

What do you know about North Korea?

I know it's south neighboor has one of the fastest internet network.

What do you know about Nauru ?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-27T12:16:51Z" title="04/27/2015 12:16  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 27, 2015</time> by WinkAllKerb''**
  
Ã‚Â¯\\_(Ã£Æ’â€ž)\_/Ã‚Â¯ shazzzaaaam Ã‚Â¯\\_(Ã£Æ’â€ž)\_/Ã‚Â¯

Well, I know it's had a history with conflict, especially with South Korea and United States, and is a communist country.

What do you know about the Philippines?

Well, they're islands in Asia. Yup.

What do you know about Venezuela?

Well, I know that if you find your plane is landing in Venice, then someone made a mistake somewhere.

What do you know about Lichtenstein?

It's small, rich, and has an army as large as the NYPD, or even slightly smaller.

WDYK about San Marino?

nothing.

what do you know about Russia?

It's big. It's **bearly** got a national symbol. It's cold. It's big.

WDYK about America?

Against all stereotypes?

i know that America is a rich country that is made up of 50 states which o

are made out of county's and 

America believes that it's form of gov is the best 

WDTUBM know about Russia

I know of a very nice lady from there who's into violence and rockets, and also they have an underrated and growing PC games industry ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

What do you know about the demo scene?
Sal- Hate to say it, but the OP said countries.
Oh woops, okay What do you know about Malta?

They make expensive falcons and still have knights. 

What do you know abou the Kyrgyz Republic?

They're pretty landlocked.

What do you know about Micronesia?

Oops too late.

Ok, editing

They are not running out of water in the near future.

What do you know about Mongolia?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-28T19:37:45Z" title="04/28/2015 07:37  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 28, 2015</time> by LN400**

Good hot pots!

What do you know about Vanutau?

It's an island in the South Pacific.

WDYK about Iran?

(Question, can we do historical countries as well?)

It is still flying F-14's!

What do you know about Iraq?

It used to have Exocet missiles.

What do you know about South Korea, aka worst Korea.

That it actually is best Korea.

What do you know about Minecraftia?

It's totally a real country.

> 
> That it actually is best Korea.
> What do you know about Minecraftia?
> 
> It's totally a real country.

I know its not recognized by the UN

WDUKA Russia (rep will be added for "Moskau" reference)

It's government is killing less people with airstrikes than the US

WDUKA Liberland, the world's newest country?

Just a reminder to keep it polite and away from politics here.

I know very little about Liberland.

What do you know about the Royal Navy?
